dict.string: $(DEVELOPMENT_LANGUAGE)
Watfoe
$(EXECUTABLE_NAME)
$(PRODUCT_BUNDLE_IDENTIFIER)
watfoe
APPL
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NAME)
$(FLUTTER_BUILD_NUMBER)
LaunchScreen
Main
We need this so that you can take and share photos and videos.
Watfoe stores your contacts heavily encrypted in the cloud to let you connect with your friends across all your devices.
You can use Face ID to unlock the app.
When you send your location to your friends, Watfoe needs access to show them a map. You also need this to send locations from an Apple Watch.
When you send your location to your friends, Watfoe needs access to show them a map.
We need this so that you can record and share voice messages and videos with sound.
When you send your location to your friends, Watfoe needs access to show them a map.
We need this so that you can share photos and videos from your photo library.
We need this so that you can share photos and videos from your photo library.
You can use Siri to send messages.
